name: Mindrot Thrall
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: The Mindrot Thrall is a Medium-sized plant creature characterized by its fungal appearance, exuding an unsettling aura. It displays physical features similar to rotting vegetation, contributing to its formidable presence in battle.
memorable: Its ability to transmit the mindrot disease and raise the deceased as more Mindrot Thralls makes it a persistent threat.
goals: To infect opponents with mindrot disease and weaken them in combat.
relations: Related to other fungal entities and might be encountered with lesser plant creatures.
environment: Typically found in damp, decaying environments where fungi thrive.
strengths: Has acid and poison immunity and features a powerful Spore Breath attack.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to specific damage types which can be exploited by players.
attacks: Performs multiple Claw attacks and emits a cone of acidic spores as a ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Spore Breath releases a dangerous blast of acidic spores that can both damage and infect.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations in its surroundings.
skills: Not proficient in any specific skills, focusing on its natural capabilities.
additional_information: Fungal Aura infects nearby creatures with a debilitating disease.
Mindrot disease causes ongoing acid damage and hit point reduction.
Can resurrect deceased beings as new Mindrot Thralls.
Significant constitution and dexterity attributes enhancing its durability and agility.
Multiattack feature enhances its ability to threaten multiple foes at once.
test_queries: eerie thrall that raises the dead
